Basic statistics

```{r descr, echo=FALSE}
summary(data)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
names(data)
data.frame(data)
boxplot(Emissions~State,
  data=data,
  main="Emissions by State",
  xlab="State",
  ylab="Emissions",
  col="orange",
  border="brown"
)

boxplot(Satisfaction~State,
  data=data,
  main="Satisfaction by State",
  xlab="State",
  ylab="Satisfaction (1-10)",
  col="orange",
  border="brown"
)
```
